contextId.information: AT: "The people have built under my leadership" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
The words "eyes" and "ears" refer to God, who chooses to see and hear their prayers. AT: "I will see them and I will listen" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: my eyes will be open ... my ears attentive

contextId.information: Solomon represents his whole fighting army. AT: "Solomon's army attacked the town of Hamathzolbah" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
AT: "now I have seen it for myself" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: now my eyes have seen it

contextId.information: "all the people of the nation of Israel". (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])

contextId.quote: entrusted them into the hands of the commanders

contextId.information: AT: "Many of the people who lived in Judah rejoiced" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
"sent his armies to attack the cities" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: sent the commanders of his armies against the cities

contextId.information: AT: "with one opinion" or "and they all agreed" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
AT: "your presence is here in this house" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: your name is in this house

contextId.information: This is a reference to every fighting man (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]]
contextId.quote: every man of Judah and Jerusalem

contextId.information: AT: - "Hezekiah encouraged himself and the people to build up" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: Hezekiah took courage and built up

contextId.information: AT: "the people of Judah and Jerusalem" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem

contextId.information: AT: "he commanded the people of Judah" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
AT: "the people built under the leadership of King Solomon" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: that Solomon son of David, king of Israel built
